title: Open Source Financial Education | Free Tools to Empower Financial Literacy
description: Explore how open source projects empower financial education by providing free, collaborative, and accessible tools like budgeting apps, investment calculators, and financial management software. Learn how these tools promote financial literacy and inclusion.
keywords: Open source financial education, financial literacy tools, budgeting apps, financial inclusion, free financial tools, GnuCash, Firefly III, Ledger, Open Budgeteer, open source finance
